verbose.description: If true, use console to log progress.

routes.description: List of routes to render. A file is created for each route.

mapStatsToParams.description: Used to pass additional values to each render.

renderDirectory.description: The directory to render files to.

renderConcurrency.description: Whether to render serial or parallel

transformFilePath.description: Used to build the file path from the route.

renderEntry.description: Which webpack entry should be used to render.

compilerToRenderWith.description: Used to automatically select a configuration to render from.

extraGlobals.description: Extra values to pass to the global scope.
